comment: So awesome! One of the best professors I have ever had. Totally recommend!

4 exams make up your grade! She seems really busy so theres no d2l, hw, classwork just show up and listen & engage. She gives study guides exact replicas of the upcoming tests. Tests are paper pencil in person. Lowest exam dropped. All should be easy As and attendance is not required but you may earn bonus points. 2 exams were open notes
